channel.title: Linux Reader
channel.description: Welcome! Check out super awesome Linux stuff: Ansible Bash Scripting Containers Cyber Security Desktop Keyboard Networking RedHat Storage Tools Virtualization Also check out what I am doing now, read my book notes, contact me, or see what this site is all about
